description:
Pilots http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker] and http://anidb.net/ch7654 [Ichijou Hikaru] flew Fokker D.VII replicas during their earlier years in the flying circus. The Fokker D.VII itself is an older warplane dating back to World War I, flying in combat operations as early as 1918. It was an advanced craft for the era and possessed superior handling characteristics over competing warplanes.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/fokkerdvii.htm
name: Fokker D.VII Replica
